testcase.name: Update Account
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://demo.spreecommerce.org' .................................... passed * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed * header Content-Type = ' application/vnd.api+json' ....................... passed * def AccessFeatureFile = call read('AccessToken.feature') ................ passed * def AccessToken = AccessFeatureFile.AccessToken ......................... passed Given header Authorization = 'Bearer '+ AccessToken ....................... passed When path '/api/v2/storefront/account' .................................... passed And request ............................................................... passed When method PATCH ......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed * def jsonobject = response ............................................... passed * print jsonobject ........................................................ passed
